description: NASA has stacked the Artemis 2 rocket’s second stage at Kennedy Space Centre, marking major progress toward its 2026 crewed moon mission. Despite this milestone, a recent budget proposal recommends ending the SLS program after Artemis 3, raising questions about the long-term future of NASA's lunar exploration strategy and deep space transportation system.
title: NASA Stacks Artemis 2 Second Stage While the Future of SLS Remains Uncertain

description: In a rare airborne mission, scientists chased ESA's Cluster Salsa satellite as it reentered Earth's atmosphere. The fiery descent revealed emissions of lithium, potassium, and aluminum—chemicals that could impact the ozone layer and climate. With satellite reentries increasing, researchers aim to improve pollution models and plan further tracking missions through 2026.
title: Scientists Chase Falling Satellite to Study Atmospheric Pollution from Spacecraft Reentries

description: A new brain study reveals how we process language when reading silently or aloud. It uncovers distinct neural responses for letters, words, and pseudo-words, offering groundbreaking insight into how the brain manages language—and paving the way for improved approaches to reading disorders like dyslexia.
title: What Happens in Your Brain When You Read? New Study Maps the Reading Mind

description: Airtel has introduced two new international roaming plans for users in India that offer voice calls and data in 189 countries. They are available with validity options of 10 and 30 days. Overseas travellers on Airtel postpaid connections can enjoy in-flight benefits with one of the newly released plans as well. Both new offerings are said to extend support for unlimited data.
title: Airtel Introduces New International Roaming Plans With Unlimited Data in India

description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is reportedly working on an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that can generate code in real-time. As per the report, the project is internally being called Kiro, and it can tap into AI agents to complete complex coding tasks. The tool is said to be a comprehensive system capable of writing code, designing user interfaces (UIs), identifying glitches and bugs, and optimising existing code.
title: Amazon Web Services Is Reportedly Working On an AI-Powered Coding Agent

description: Samsung has reportedly started pushing the May software update to its newest Galaxy A series devices, including the Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36, and Galaxy A26. A key highlight of this update is a new feature for the side or power button, which now allows users to quickly access Gemini. The press-and-hold shortcut functionality for Gemini was limited to the flagship Galaxy S series smartphones earlier.
title: Samsung's Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36 Reportedly Get Google Gemini Side Button Functionality

description: Tether said that its RWA tokenisation platform, dubbed Hadron, has been integrated with on-chain intelligence firm Chainalysis. Tether expects to attract institutional investors to engage with Hadron by upgrading its security capabilities.
title: Tether to Equip Hadron Platform With Chainalysis Compliance, Monitoring Tools

description: Asus ROG Ally 2 is expected to launch in the coming weeks as the company's next handheld gaming console, and the design and specifications of the device recently leaked online. A US FCC listing indicates both the ROG Ally 2 and the Xbox-branded 'Project Kennan' will feature 7-inch 120Hz displays and run on AMD processors. Leaked images also give us a good look at the upcoming devices.
title: Asus ROG Ally 2 Spotted via US FCC Listing Alongside 'Project Kennan' Xbox Handheld

description: Netflix has unveiled a redesigned TV app homepage, aiming to improve user navigation. The streaming giant has integrated generative AI into its search, enabling natural language queries. Users can expect more personalized and responsive content recommendations based on their viewing habits. The updated homepage will also feature live and sporting events alongside its regular movie and TV series offerings.
title: Netflix Redesigns TV App With Responsive Recommendations, Adds GenAI Search on iOS

description: Reliance Jio is said to have halted its plans of rolling out express home delivery of SIM cards in India. As per a report, the Department of Telecommunications (DoT) intervened before the telecom operator’s initiative was publicly announced and objected to it, citing national security concerns. It has reportedly directed Jio, along with other service providers in the country, to make an Aadhaar-based self-KYC mandatory before SIM cards are delivered to customers.
title: Reliance Jio Reportedly Halts Express Home Delivery of SIM Cards Following DoT Directive

description: Samsung seems to be aiming to bring its upcoming foldable with a slim form factor. A recent leak suggests that Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 could debut as the world's thinnest foldable smartphone. It is said to measure 8.9mm in thickness in the folded state. However, Samsung's push for a slimmer design may come at a cost; the Galaxy Z Fold 7 is tipped to retain the 4,400mAh battery as the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 to Reportedly Be World's Thinnest Foldable When Launched

description: Samsung unveiled its 2025 range of smart TV lineup in India on Wednesday. The portfolio includes Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED smart TVs, and The Frame lineup. This will also be the first smart TV lineup from the South Korean tech giant that will be equipped with Vision AI technology.
title: Samsung Unveils 2025 Smart TV Lineup in India With Vision AI Features: Price, Availability

description: Sony's WH-1000XM6 headphones are likely to be unveiled soon. The Sony WH-1000XM5 successor is expected to launch at a higher price point than the existing model. Ahead of anything official, key features of the wireless headset have surfaced online. Previously, the headphones were spotted on the FCC certification site.
title: Sony WH-1000XM6 Price, Key Features Surface Online; Could Offer Up to 30 Hours Battery Life

description: Split Fiction, the genre-bending co-op adventure title from Hazelight Studios, has sold four million copies, the studio announced Wednesday. The confirmation came after publisher Electronic Arts said at its Q4 2025 earnings call that the game was nearing the sales milestone and was “highly successful” for the company, exceeding its expectations.
title: Split Fiction Sells 4 Million Copies, Nearly Doubling EA's Expectations

description: Embark on this mystery tale, as Asthram is ready to land on your digital screens on May 9, 2025. This film revolves around an investigation that follows a series of suicides with an unusual pattern. However, when the truth is uncovered, the viewers are left stunned. Asthram will start streaming on Aha Tamil. The movie will be available in the Tamil language only.
title: Ashtram OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tamil Crime Thriller Online?

description: Hugging Face released a demo of an artificial intelligence (AI) agent on Tuesday that can complete various web-based tasks. Dubbed Open Computer Agent, the tool is available for free, and anyone can go to the website to access the agent. Since it can perform tasks on web browsers, it can access websites such as Google Search, Maps, and even ticket booking platforms to complete tasks autonomously.
title: Hugging Face Releases a Free AI Agent That Can Complete Computer-Based Tasks

description: India has set up a panel to review if existing copyright law is sufficient to tackle AI-related disputes. The memo, which is not public, said the commerce ministry set up a panel of eight experts last month to examine issues related to AI and their implications for India's copyright law.
title: India Panel to Review Copyright Law Amid Legal Challenges to OpenAI

description: Realme GT 7 is set to launch in India soon. As we wait for the launch date announcement, the Chinese smartphone brand has teased the colour options of the handset. The Realme GT 7 is confirmed to have the world's first graphene-based IceSense design for enhanced thermal performance. The GT series handset was launched in the Chinese market in April with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset and a 7,200mAh battery.
title: Realme GT 7 Colour Options Teased; Confirmed to Feature IceSense Design for Heat Management

description: Sony Xperia 1 VII is expected to break cover soon. The company has confirmed that it will host a launch event next week. The purported handset, which was recently spotted on a benchmarking website, is expected to be unveiled during the event.
title: Sony Schedules Launch Event for May 13; Expected to Unveil Xperia 1 VII

description: Electronic Arts (EA) forecast fiscal 2026 bookings above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday. EA's positive outlook signals the gaming industry's optimism around sales resilience in the face of a broader pullback in consumer spending amid macroeconomic volatility stemming from US tariffs.
title: EA Forecasts Annual Bookings Above Estimates With New Battlefield Game Launching FY 2026

description: Microsoft has announced the next Xbox exclusive going multiplatform. Gears of War: Reloaded, a remastered version of the original game, will release on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X on August 26, 2025, the company said Monday.
title: Gears of War: Reloaded Is Coming to PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X in August

description: Haier C95 and C90 OLED TVs have been launched in India. The new lineup, powered by Google TV, comes with OLED screens with a 4K resolution. It is offered in multiple display sizes options, sporting bezel-less builds. As per the company, Haier C95 and C90 OLED TVs are equipped with support for HDR10+ and Dolby Vision IQ for picture quality enhancement. These visual technologies are complemented by audio powered by Harman Kardon.
title: Haier C95 and C90 OLED TVs With Dolby Vision IQ and Harman Kardon Sound Launched in India

description: Looking for a heartfelt Tamil romantic series? Madurai Paiyanum Chennai Ponnum brings you the story of Subhash and Mira—two people from vastly different worlds who find love in each other. Now streaming on Aha Tamil with new episodes releasing weekly. Don’t miss the emotional highs, humorous moments, and cultural clashes that make this series a fan favourite.
title: Madurai Paiyanum Chennai Ponnum OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Maria, the story of the popular opera singer, is played by Angelina Jolie. While for fans, what feels like popularity has it all, this Pablo Larrain-directed biopic is sure to change that with a different and more narrative of Maria as she explores the recollections of her past memories, relations, and fame that take an emotional toll on her. The movie will be released on Lionsgate on May 9th, 2025.
title: Maria OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Angelina Jolie Starrer Movie Online?
Now’s the Moment: Grab the OnePlus 13R at Its Best Value Yet

description: OpenAI plans to share a smaller fraction of revenue with Microsoft as it moves ahead with its restructuring. OpenAI said the percentage of revenue shared with Microsoft would drop by at least half by the end of this decade.
title: OpenAI Plans to Cut Microsoft Revenue Share After Restructuring: Report

description: In conversation with Gadgets 360, Jimmy Su, the chief security officer of Binance, strongly suggested that crypto firms deploy a multi-layered defence strategy in order to ensure the safety of user funds. Su emphasised that global Web3 industry must prioritise collaborative efforts to combat crime risks.
title: Binance’s Security Chief Jimmy Su on Crypto Security, Regulation and More

description: Google updated the existing Gemini 2.5 Pro artificial intelligence (AI) model with enhanced coding capabilities on Tuesday. The Mountain View-based tech giant is calling the newer version of the model Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (I/O edition). Interestingly, the company said that it had planned to release this version at its upcoming Google I/O 2025 event.
title: Gemini 2.5 Pro Updated With Improved Coding Capabilities Ahead of Google I/O 2025

description: LiveCaller has been launched as a free real-time caller ID application for iPhones and an alternative to Truecaller and Hiya. Leveraging Apple's iOS 18.2 framework, it displays caller details directly on the screen. The app offers free protection against spam, robocalls, telemarketers, and fraud. Unlike its competitors, LiveCaller doesn't require contact access or user account creation.
title: LiveCaller Launched as Free Truecaller Alternative for iPhone Users With iOS 18

description: Maranamass, written and directed by Sivaprasad, is a must-watch thriller comedy that stars Basil Joseph in the lead. The movie follows a serial killer who has stunned the entire city by killing older men. Will the police succeed, or is there any truth waiting to be uncovered? Watch on Sony LIV from 15th May 2025.
title: Maranamass OTT Release Date Out: Know When and Where to Watch

description: Oppo Pad SE will launch in China on May 15. The Oppo Reno 14 series is expected to arrive in the country on the same day. Ahead of the launch, the company has revealed the colour options of the upcoming tablet. It has confirmed some key features of the Oppo Pad SE as well. The brand is set to unveil the Oppo Enco Clip TWS earphones alongside the tablet and smartphones.
title: Oppo Pad SE Colour Options, Key Features Confirmed Ahead of May 15 Launch

description: Anthropic announced its AI for Science programme on Monday. The new initiative is aimed at accelerating scientific research and discovery. The artificial intelligence (AI) firm said it wants to support researchers and scientists working on “high-impact scientific projects, with a particular focus on biology and life sciences applications” via this initiative.
title: Anthropic Announces AI for Science Programme to Assist Researchers Accelerate Projects

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 1.50 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether saw small gains on Wednesday, May 7. Ripple, Chainlink, Avalanche logged minor profits. Tron and Polkadot, meanwhile, saw losses.
title: Bitcoin Surges Past $96,400 Ahead of FOMC Meeting, Altcoins Show Mixed Movement

description: Google app for iOS is getting a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will allow users to help understand complex text in articles and web pages. The Mountain View-based tech giant began shipping the feature, dubbed Simplify, starting Tuesday. It is powered by Gemini AI models. Users can highlight the desired text to get an AI-generated rewrite that breaks down complex language, jargon, and subject area-specific technical terms.
title: Google App for iOS Gets AI-Powered ‘Simplify’ Feature to Break Down Complex Text

description: Google on Tuesday rolled out the May 2025 update for Pixel devices. It is released as an over-the-air (OTA) update for the company's latest Pixel 9 series, Pixel Tablet, and other older models running the latest Android 15 OS. As per Google, the May 2025 update brings fixes for issues related to audio, Bluetooth, and framework. Further, it also bundles the latest security patch with fixes for three system vulnerabilities labelled as “high” in severity.
title: Google Pixel Phones Receiving May 2025 Update With Bug Fixes and Latest Security Patch

description: Moto G86 5G may launch in select global markets soon. The company has yet to officially confirm any details about the handset, but leaks and reports have hinted at its expected price and colour options. Recently, a new leak has suggested the key specifications of the purported smartphone. It is tipped to be offered in two battery size options — 5,200mAh and 6,720mAh.
title: Moto G86 5G Key Features Leaked; Could Launch With Up to a 6,720mAh Battery

description: Motorola Edge 60 Pro went on sale in India for the first time today (May 7). The new Motorola handset was launched in the country last week with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor under the hood. The new Edge series phone is now available for purchase via Flipkart and the Motorola India website. The Motorola Edge 60 Pro has a triple rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary sensor.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Specifications, Launch Offers

description: OnePlus Ace 5 Pro and OnePlus Ace 5 with Snapdragon SoCs were launched last year. Now, OnePlus appears to be preparing to unveil a new OnePlus Ace 5 Supreme Edition or OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra handset. The exact moniker is not confirmed yet, but ahead of that, the purported handset has surfaced on the Geekbench database.
title: OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+  Runs Geekbench; New OnePlus Earbuds Spotted on FCC

description: With One UI 7 being widely rolled out, Samsung is already said to be working on its next iteration dubbed One UI 8. As per a tipster, the update may bring a noticeable improvement to Now Bar, a feature which the company introduced with its Android 15-based OS. While it currently provides a lock screen quick view of insights generated by the Galaxy AI-powered Now Brief, Samsung is tipped to equip it with more capabilities, such as phone calls and a Do Not Disturb option.
title: Samsung Tipped to Bring Phone Calls, Do Not Disturb and More Features to Now Bar With One UI 8

description: Days after announcing that Grand Theft Auto 6 would be delayed to 2026, Rockstar Games shared the second trailer of the game Tuesday in a surprise drop, revealing details about the story, characters and setting. GTA 6 trailer 2 finally showcases Jason Duval, the second playable protagonist in the game alongside Lucia, who received the spotlight in the first trailer.
title: GTA 6 Finally Gets Second Trailer as Rockstar Details Second Protagonist Jason, Story and More

description: Microsoft introduced two new Surface Copilot+ PCs powered by Snapdragon X Plus processors on Tuesday. The latest Microsoft Surface Laptop 13-inch and the Surface Pro 12-inch run on the octa-core Snapdragon X Plus processor. They include a dedicated Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that is capable of delivering 45 trillion operations per second (TOPS). Microsoft's Surface Pro 12-inch features a 2-in-1 design.
title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 13-Inch, Surface Pro 12-Inch Copilot+ PCs With Snapdragon X Plus Processor Launched

description: Honor 400 Pro is expected to arrive in select regions soon alongside the standard Honor 400 model. The handsets appeared on Geekbench recently, which suggested their chipset details. Meanwhile, the price and expected key features of the base variant have been tipped before. A new report has now hinted at the possible price point of the purported Pro version alongside its probable specifications.
title: Honor 400 Pro Price, Key Features Leaked Online Ahead of Anticipated Global Launch

description: iOS 18.5 is expected to roll out to users in the coming days, and Apple has already rolled out the iOS 18.5 release candidate to beta testers. The update will introduce changes to the Apple TV app on third-party devices and add new functionality to the iOS Screen Time feature. iPhone 13 users will gain access to satellite features through supported network providers.
title: iOS 18.5 Release Candidate Rolls Out to Beta Testers With Satellite Connectivity on iPhone 13

description: Alongside its newest foldables, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Samsung has been rumoured to introduce a more affordable version of its clamshell-style foldable phone during this year’s Galaxy Unpacked. Dubbed the Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE, the purported handset's pricing and specifications have been leaked, as per a report. It may come with a similar-sized cover screen as the Galaxy Z Flip 6 and will likely have a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor under the hood.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Price Reportedly Leaks; May Debut With Same Specifications as Galaxy Z Flip 6

description: Vivo X200 FE is said to be in development as the latest addition to the flagship X200 lineup for the Indian market. As per a report, the phone will be equipped with a 1.5K OLED screen with a 120Hz refresh rate. For security it could have an under-display fingerprint scanner. Although official information remains under wraps, the purported handset is speculated to use a binned version of the Dimensity 9300+ chipset.
title: Vivo X200 FE India Launch Reportedly Set for July; May Come With 1.5K OLED Screen, 6,500mAh Battery
